alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 9:18PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Otero, central Crowley and east central Pueblo Counties through 1000 PM MDT... At 918 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Crowley to near Manzanola to 11 miles northwest of Timpas. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rocky Ford, Fowler, Ordway, Manzanola, Olney Springs, Sugar City, Crowley and Timpas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
